name: All You Can Eat (itch) (Wattosan)
description:
Have you ever seen those school food fights on the TV, well now is your time to experience that in an all you can eat buffet. Run around, pick up food and use it to knock out people who want to end your fun. Keep in mind that you have a limited time to move and every action drains some of your (stamina).

“Press SPACE to Jump” team is not responsible for any food related injuries nor death.

This is a game made in a 48h gamejam called "University of Tartu Pro Game 2022 - Pro League".

Credits: Gris Reinesberg, Isabella Lee, Markus Margus, Jens-Stefan Mikson
